fontScanner.title: Fonts & Typography
fontScanner.subtitle: Typography Analysis
fontScanner.pageSubtitle: Deep typography analysis with multi-page scanning, font loading performance, and accessibility insights.
fontScanner.multiPageScan: Multi-page scan (analyze fonts across multiple pages)
fontScanner.enhancedAnalysisDesc: Detects font providers (Google Fonts, Adobe Fonts, self-hosted), finds duplicate families, unused weights/styles, missing font-display declarations, and preload opportunities.
fontScanner.dualViewportAnalysis: Dual Viewport Analysis: Fonts analyzed separately for desktop (1920x1080) and mobile (375x667) viewports.
fontScanner.commonFonts: Common fonts used on both viewports

brandConsistency.title: Brand Inspection
brandConsistency.subtitle: Analyze color palette, fonts, and logo usage across your website for brand alignment.
brandConsistency.addLogoTip: Add a logo with alt text containing "logo" for better brand recognition
brandConsistency.faviconPresentDesc: Your site has a favicon for browser tab identification
brandConsistency.faviconMissingDesc: Add a favicon to help users identify your site in browser tabs

excessiveColors.detail: Using {count} colors creates visual chaos. Professional brands use 5-10 colors maximum.
excessiveColors.action: Create a defined color palette with primary, secondary, and accent colors.

tooManyColors.detail: Using {count} colors. Streamline to 8-12 brand colors for better consistency.
tooManyColors.action: Audit your color usage and remove redundant variations.

inconsistentHarmony.detail: Your color palette lacks a clear harmony pattern (complementary, analogous, or triadic).
inconsistentHarmony.action: Use a color wheel to select harmonious colors that work together.

tooManyFonts.detail: Using {count} different fonts creates visual inconsistency and hurts performance.
tooManyFonts.action: Limit to 2-3 font families: one for headings, one for body text, and optionally one for accents.

reduceFontCount.detail: Using {count} fonts. Best practice is 2-3 fonts maximum.
reduceFontCount.action: Review font usage and consolidate where possible.

noTypographyHierarchy.detail: Could not identify distinct heading and body fonts.
noTypographyHierarchy.action: Ensure headings and body text use consistent, distinct font treatments.

noLogo.detail: A logo is essential for brand recognition and trust.
noLogo.action: Add a logo in the header with proper alt text containing "logo".

noFavicon.detail: A favicon helps users identify your site in browser tabs and bookmarks.
noFavicon.action: Add a favicon.ico or use <link rel="icon"> with your brand icon.

inconsistentButtons.detail: Buttons across your site have varying colors and shapes.
inconsistentButtons.action: Define standard button styles in your CSS and use them consistently.

inconsistentLinks.detail: Links use multiple different colors across the page.
inconsistentLinks.action: Set a consistent link color that matches your brand palette.

excellent.detail: Your website maintains strong visual consistency across colors, typography, and branding elements.
excellent.action: Continue maintaining your brand guidelines and conduct periodic audits.
